a-na LUGAL EN-a ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN o lu šul-mu a-na LUGAL EN-a DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-a {LU₂}mat-a.a ša bat-te-bat-te-e-ni ne₂-e-hu ša LUGAL EN iš-pur-an-ni ma-a DUMU {1}ka-rak-ku ša {URU}ur-ia-ku ṣa-ab-ta kil-aš₂-šu₂ ma-a {1}ra-me-ti-i ina ku-mu-uš-šu₂ pi-iq-da ki-i ša LUGAL EN iš-pur-an-ni DUMU {1}ka-rak-ku a-sa-par i-ṣab-tu ak-tal-aš₂-šu₂ {1}ra-me-ti-i ina ku-mu-šu₂ nu-se-bi-il {1}aš-šur-DIB-an-ni i-tu-bil₂-šu₂ {URU}ur-ia-ak-a.a la i-ma-gu-ru ina šap-la-nu-uš-šu₂ ma-a DUMU {1}ir-tuk-ka-nu x x x x+x hi x+x x x x x x x še-bi-la x+x x x x x ki-i ša LUGAL EN i-ša₂-x x x x
